title: REPs (Regenerative Endodontic Procedures) Training: Distance Education Based on the 4C-ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge and clinical experience in endodontic treatment
context.additional_context: Advanced professional learners in managerial/leadership roles performing project-based assessments in an online educational setting using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can explain and demonstrate the core principles and clinical application procedures of Regenerative Endodontic Procedures (REPs).
Learners can apply REPs techniques to real-world clinical scenarios using the 'supportive information' and 'procedural information' components of the 4C-ID model.
Learners can design the entire process from planning to implementing REPs through project-based assessments and document execution outcomes in a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
